Original: (Mishnah Berurah 219: 1) 1] after crossing the ocean and reaching his destination
Comment: (Mishnah Berurah 219: 1) 1) after crossing the ocean and reaching his destination

Original: 2] after crossing the desert or any other dangerous road and reaching his destination
LaTeX: 2) after crossing the desert or any other dangerous road and reaching his destination

Original: 3] one who suffered from serious illness or a serious injury or he was confined to bed for [at least] three days due to an illness and he recovered, his health restored;
LaTeX: 3) one who suffered from serious illness or a serious injury or he was confined to bed for [at least] three days due to an illness and he recovered, his health restored;

Original: 4] one who was in prison even if [he was in prison] only because of monetary matters and he was released.
LaTeX: 4) one who was in prison even if [he was in prison] only because of monetary matters and he was released.

Original: even if he the agent intended] to buy it for himself.
LaTeX: even if he [the agent] intended to buy it for himself.
